scoreText.js
¶ 
1  var Phaser = require('phaser');
2  
3  
4
¶

Here is a custom game object

 
4  
5  function ScoreText(game) {
6    console.debug("creating a ScoreText!", game);
7  
8    var style = {
9      font: '30px Arial',
10      fill: '#fff'
11    };
12    Phaser.Text.call(this, game, 20, 20, "0", style);
13  
14    game.add.existing(this);
15  
16  
17    this.score = 0;
18  
19  }
20  
21  ScoreText.prototype = Object.create(Phaser.Text.prototype);
22  ScoreText.prototype.constructor = ScoreText;
23  
24  
25  ScoreText.prototype.update = function () {
26    this.setText("" + this.score);
27    this.content = this.score;
28  };
29  
30  
31  ScoreText.prototype.addScore = function () {
32    this.score += 1;
33  };
34  
35  
36  ScoreText.prototype.resetScore = function () {
37    var previousHighscore = localStorage.getItem("highscore");
38    if (!previousHighscore || previousHighscore < this.score) {
39      localStorage.setItem("highscore", this.score);
40    }
41  
42    localStorage.setItem("lastscore", this.score);
43  
44  };
45  
46  module.exports = ScoreText;
47
